General.Name: Groupe Tera SA
General.Description: Groupe Tera SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the analysis of chemical air pollutants in France, rest of Europe, the United States, China, and internationally. The company offers toxicology and environmental analysis laboratory services; develops, industrializes, and markets sensors to measure air quality in real-time; and develops applications for real-time analysis of air quality. It also offers air and respiratory protection technologies and devices for the treatment of respiratory viruses. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Crolles, France.
General.Address: 628 Rue Charles De Gaulle, Crolles, France, 38920
